questions.question: What are your delivery hours?
questions.answer: We deliver Monday-Sunday 10:30 AM - 8:00 PM.

questions.question: What's the minimum order for delivery?
questions.answer: Our minimum delivery order is $15.00 (before tax and delivery fee).

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover) and cash for pickup orders.

questions.question: Can I modify or cancel my order?
questions.answer: Orders can be modified or cancelled within 5 minutes of placement by calling us directly at (617) 555-PIZZA.

questions.question: Do you offer contactless delivery?
questions.answer: Yes! You can request contactless delivery in the special instructions when placing your order.

questions.question: Do you offer gluten-free options?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer gluten-free pizza crusts and several gluten-free menu items. Please inform us of any allergies when ordering.

questions.question: Are your ingredients fresh?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We make our dough fresh daily, use San Marzano tomatoes, and source the highest quality ingredients.

questions.question: Can I customize my pizza?
questions.answer: Of course! You can customize any pizza with your choice of toppings, sauces, and cheese options.

questions.question: Do you have vegan options?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer vegan cheese and a variety of vegetable toppings. Many of our salads can also be made vegan.

questions.question: What size pizzas do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer Personal (10"), Medium (14"), Large (16"), and Extra Large (18") pizzas.

questions.question: What areas do you deliver to?
questions.answer: We deliver within a 5-mile radius of our Boston location. Enter your address during checkout to confirm delivery availability.

questions.question: How long does delivery take?
questions.answer: Typical delivery time is 25-35 minutes, but may vary during peak hours or bad weather.

questions.question: What's the delivery fee?
questions.answer: Our delivery fee is $3.99. This fee covers our delivery service but is not a tip for the driver.

questions.question: Can I track my order?
questions.answer: Yes! You'll receive order updates via SMS and email, and can track your order status online.

questions.question: What if no one is home for delivery?
questions.answer: Our driver will attempt to contact you. If unreachable, the order will be returned to the store and you may need to arrange pickup.

questions.question: Do I need to create an account to order?
questions.answer: No, you can place orders as a guest. However, creating an account allows you to save addresses, track orders, and earn rewards.

questions.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
questions.answer: Yes! Create an account to start earning points with every order. Points can be redeemed for free pizzas and discounts.

questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your email.

questions.question: Can I save multiple addresses?
questions.answer: Yes, logged-in users can save multiple delivery addresses for quick ordering.

questions.question: Are you hiring?
questions.answer: We're always looking for great team members! Check our careers page or stop by the restaurant to inquire about current openings.

questions.question: Do you cater events?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer catering for parties, corporate events, and special occasions. Contact us at (617) 555-PIZZA for catering details.

questions.question: Can I buy gift cards?
questions.answer: Gift cards are available for purchase at our restaurant location. Online gift cards are coming soon!

questions.question: Do you offer nutritional information?
questions.answer: Nutritional information is available upon request. Please contact us for specific dietary information.
